movie.title: Down with Love
movie.description_intro: An homage to the early 1960s sex comedies that starred Rock Hudson and Doris Day. The story follows a best-selling female advice author who has all the answers until a sly journalist playboy starts asking the questions.
movie.description_full: An homage to the early 1960s sex comedies that starred Rock Hudson and Doris Day. The story follows a best-selling female advice author who has all the answers until a sly journalist playboy starts asking the questions.

movies.title: The Carer
movies.summary: Dorottya is a young Hungarian actress with a burning desire: to make it on the English stage. Legendary actor Sir Michael Gifford suffers from an incurable disease, and has one desire: be left alone. When Dorottya becomes his carer they both hope their wish will be fulfilled.
movies.description_full: Dorottya is a young Hungarian actress with a burning desire: to make it on the English stage. Legendary actor Sir Michael Gifford suffers from an incurable disease, and has one desire: be left alone. When Dorottya becomes his carer they both hope their wish will be fulfilled.

movies.title: His Girl Friday
movies.summary: Having been away for four months, Hildy Johnson walks into the offices of the New York City based The Morning Post, where she is a star reporter, to tell her boss, editor Walter Burns, that she is quitting. The reason for her absence was among other things to get a Reno divorce, from, of all people, Walter, who admits he was a bad husband. Hildy divorced Walter largely because she wanted more of a home life, whereas Walter saw her more as a driven hard-boiled reporter than subservient homemaker. Hildy has also come to tell Walter that she is taking the afternoon train to Albany, where she will be getting married tomorrow to staid straight-laced insurance agent, Bruce Baldwin, with whose mother they will live, at least for the first year. Walter doesn't want to lose Hildy, either as a reporter or a wife, and if he does, doesn't believe Bruce is worthy of her. Walter does whatever he can at least to delay Hildy and Bruce's trip, long enough to persuade Hildy to stay for good. His plan ...

movies.title: Antarctica
movies.summary: Two life-long best friends face a tidal wave of adult pressures and problems as they face down their last year of high school in small-town USA.
movies.description_full: Two life-long best friends face a tidal wave of adult pressures and problems as they face down their last year of high school in small-town USA.
movies.synopsis: Two life-long best friends face a tidal wave of adult pressures and problems as they face down their last year of high school in small-town USA.

movies.title: A Jungle Book of Regulations
movies.summary: After moving from a small flat to a bigger one, a young married couple unexpectedly meet their new flatmate.
movies.description_full: After moving from a small flat to a bigger one, a young married couple unexpectedly meet their new flatmate.
